text: Hiroyuki Konishi ( Konishi Hiroyuki; 19 October 1936 – 23 January 2022) was a Japanese politician. He was a member of the Democratic Socialist Party. He was in the House of Councillors from 1980 to 1992. He was born in Zentsūji, Japan. Konishi died in Kure, Japan on 23 January 2022 from pneumonia at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Japanese politicians Category:Kagawa Prefecture
title: Hiroyuki Konishi (politician)
